name: SINOVATE
description:
SIN describes itself as an open-source state of the art Peer-to-Peer (P2P) digital ecosystem and cryptocurrency dedicated to developing cutting edge Blockchain products, services and solutions. SIN seeks to implement innovative Blockchain technologies into all areas of the modern economy, and is constantly researching new applications for private and corporate use. SINOVATE is a decentralized network that is comprised of a combination of pre-existing and innovative blockchain technologies. This combination has been tailored specifically to overcome the challenges of scalability, security, and ingenuity. Key features include:

- X25X in-house developed Proof of Work algorithm
- 533 tx/s scalability
- LWMA and Reorg 51% Attack Protection
- InfinityNodes solving the inflation
- I.D.S. Incorruptible Data Storage
